importantInfo.title: Important Information
importantInfo.checkoutValue: By 10:00 AM (room must be vacated by 11:00 AM)
importantInfo.documentsValue: Valid ID or Passport for all guests
importantInfo.earlyNoticeText: If arriving before 2:00 PM, please contact us in advance to confirm room availability.
importantInfo.rule1: Meals are served in the restaurant only – food and drinks may not be taken out.
importantInfo.rule2: Please sign all bills for services personally.
importantInfo.rule3: Pets are not permitted in the restaurant. Do not use hotel towels, bed covers or blankets for pets.
importantInfo.rule4: Please take care of hotel inventory. Towels and sheets may not be removed from your room. Any damage will be charged.
importantInfo.rule5: Visitors are permitted in rooms only with prior reception approval.
importantInfo.rule6: For any irregularities in your room, please advise reception in person or call extension 9.
importantInfo.rule7: Electric or other cooking appliances may not be used in rooms. Quiet hours: 2:00 PM – 5:00 PM and 10:00 PM – 7:00 AM.
importantInfo.rule8: When leaving your room: switch off lights and water, lock the door, and return your key to reception. A lost key will incur an extra charge.
importantInfo.rule9: Please deposit all valuables and cash in the safe box at reception. The hotel takes no responsibility for missing items.
importantInfo.rule10: Children under 10 must be accompanied by an adult when using the elevator.
importantInfo.rule11: Please notify reception of your departure at least one day in advance.
importantInfo.rule12: Check-out is by 10:00 AM; room must be vacated by 11:00 AM. Staying after this time incurs a 50% surcharge of the daily rate.
importantInfo.rule13: For stays shorter than 3 days, the full bill is settled upon arrival. For longer stays, bills are paid weekly.
importantInfo.rule14: The hotel is not responsible for belongings left in vehicles.
